page.title: 07Steeple Langford School
page.content: Steeple Langford has a church aided school.We have a half old and half new building. Outside there is a big bit of grass and on the tarmac playground a big toy train and castle, there is a big and a little climbing frame and some old rubber tyres.Inside we have 2 classrooms and a hall.There are 32 children in the school.Our ages are from 4 to 9 years old.We have two teachers,a caretaker/cleaner(14 hrs), secretary(6hrs),lollipop lady and 2 dinner ladies.Some of us bring packed lunches,others have hot meals cooked at an Amesbury school and brought to us by car.
